
# node-lambda-zip

[![Build status][travis-image]][travis-url]
[![Git tag][git-image]][git-url]
[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![Code style][standard-image]][standard-url]

Zip a node lambda.

## Installation

    $ npm install node-lambda-zip

## Usage

```js
var nodeLambdaZip = require('node-lambda-zip')

```

## API

### nodeLambdaZip(arg)

- `arg` -
